amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Joint Economic Committee by $1,050,750 (25%) and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-173 to reduce funding for the Joint Economic Committee by $1,050,750 (25%) and transfers those dollars to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
